products.title: Style Customizer
products.name: User Registration Style Customizer
products.excerpt: Gone are the days when registration forms used to look dull and boring. Easily style your registration forms according to your needs by changing various design components such as Font size, Font color, background color, background image, Border, padding, margin, alignment and more.

products.title: Multi Step Forms
products.name: User Registration Multi Part
products.excerpt: Lengthy forms are time-consuming and boring. Form fillers easily get distracted and quit halfway through these types of forms. But, there’s no need to worry! Our User Registration Multi-Part Add-on allows you to divide your registration forms into multiple parts according to your requirements without any hassle.

products.title: File Upload
products.name: User Registration - File Upload
products.excerpt: File Upload addon for User Registration plugin allows you to create upload field in your registration form. You can use this field on your registration forms allowing your users to upload important files, documents, images and more.

products.title: Social Connect
products.name: User Registration - Social Connect
products.excerpt: Signing up made easier and faster! With this addon you can make your users register to your site with social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Google+, LinkedIn or others. Users details will be automatically pulled from their social profiles.

products.title: MailChimp
products.name: User Registration - Mailchimp
products.excerpt: MailChimp add-on of User Registration plugin synchronizes your mailChimp account with User Registration plugin and automatically subscribes your site users to your mailchimp mailing list on registration.

products.title: WooCommerce Integration
products.name: User Registration - WooCommerce
products.excerpt: Integrates WooCommerce plugin with your user-registration and allows you to manage user billing, shipping, orders via user registration account page

products.title: Content Restriction
products.name: User Registration - Content Restriction
products.excerpt: Content Restriction addon allows you to restrict full or partial content from page, post to only logged in users or logged in users with specific roles.

products.title: Advanced Fields
products.name: User Registration-Advanced Fields
products.excerpt: Advanced Fields provides you with additional advanced fields like Section Title, Custom HTML, Phone, Time Picker and WYSIWYG Fields. These fields will allow you to create more complex registration forms with ease.

products.title: Conditional Logic
products.name: User Registration Conditional Logic
products.excerpt: Conditional Logic allows you to create more dynamic forms based on user input. You can now show or hide specific fields based on the users other input in the form. A field hide or show based on on multiple conditions fulfilled.

products.title: Profile Connect
products.name: User Registration Profile Connect
products.excerpt: Connect your old users i.e users created via some other plugins, default WordPress registration form to user registration forms. Allows both individual as well as bulk connection of users to any particular form.

products.title: PDF Form Submission
products.name: User Registration PDF Form Submission
products.excerpt: PDF Form Submission addon allows to export registration form data in pdf form. PDF are great way to record, print and share with your team members. Automatically attachs the pdf to emails send to your users and admin.

products.title: PayPal Payment
products.name: User Registration Payments
products.excerpt: Integrates PayPal into your forms for registration fee payments, donations, and more. set either predefined, user defined or hidden amount on the form as per the requirement.

products.title: Stripe
products.name: User Registration Stripe
products.excerpt: Stripe Addon allows you to accept payments on your forms for donation, product sale, and other services. Stripe is one of the most popular ways to accept credit card payments right on your site without much hassle. Also, support subscription payments.

products.title: Geolocation
products.name: User Registration Geolocation
products.excerpt: Allows you to collect geo location data from users who registered on your site. Information like Country, City, Zip Code, Latitude/Longitude and location map for the user will accessible.

products.title: LearnDash
products.name: User Registration LearnDash
products.excerpt: Allows you to view user’s registered learndash courses, automatically enroll users to specified learndash courses and more.

products.title: Customize My Account
products.name: User Registration customize my account
products.excerpt: User Registration Customize My Account add-on allows you to create, edit and delete additional tabs on the account page along with custom content for that tab. Also supports drag and drop sorting of account tabs

products.title: Field Visibility
products.name: User Registration Field Visibility
products.excerpt: User Registration Field Visibility add-on allows user registration fields to be hidden in the frontend form or your account profile page as per your choice. Also, allows you to make a field read only in registration form or profile page or both.

products.title: Invite Codes
products.name: User Registration Invite Codes
products.excerpt: Allows you to restrict the registration on your site to users with invite Codes only. You can create a single or multiple invitation code, set expiry date, usage limit per invitation code and more.

products.title: Import Users
products.name: User Registration Import Users
products.excerpt: You can easily import users on your WordPress site. Just select the form to map user details, choose a user data file in CSV format, map the fields, and import your users.

products.title: Email Templates
products.name: User Registration Email Templates
products.excerpt: Allows you to choose an email template or create a custom email template. It offers an easy-to-use customizer for you to change the look and feel of your User Registration emails.

products.title: Zapier
products.name: User Registration Zapier
products.excerpt: Connect your user registration forms with Zapier with over 1500 web applications and pass information. So, you can save your time by easily automating your work.

products.title: Frontend Listing
products.name: User Registration Frontend Listing
products.excerpt: The Frontend Listing addon for User Registration allows you to list your users in frontend. Users and guests can view and check profile of all the members listed on the site.

products.title: MailerLite
products.name: User Registration MailerLite
products.excerpt: Connect your MailerLite account with User Registration Form. Users filling up registration form can directly be added to your MailerLite subscriber list. You can then use those collected data for Email Marketing.
